title: The Church’s Response To Homosexuality | Unapologetic #62
itunes:title: The Church’s Response To Homosexuality | Unapologetic #62
description: A recent survey showed that greater than 50% of Americans perceive three religious groups to be unfriendly to LGBT people: the Catholic Church (58%), the Mormon church (53%), and evangelical Christian churches (51%). It seems those numbers will continue to increase as time goes on. So how should the church respond to the LBGTQ community?
